description:
The maximum supported file size for uploaded music are 8 MB for standard account, 15 MB for premium account and 25 MB for a pro account. We recommend you to not exceed the given size limit while uploading the audio files.


The supported audio is of file format .mp3 and .wav
description_text: The maximum supported file size for uploaded music are 8 MB for standard account, 15 MB for premium account and 25 MB for a pro account. We recommend you to not exceed the given size limit while uploading the audio files.     The supported audio is of file format .mp3 and .wav
title: What are the valid file size and format for music files?
